posts.post_content:
Turns out I posted this originally in the wrong forum - Here are a few of the cards I have left that did not sell initially:

-T204 Chance - $365 - Back scan available upon request - VGish condition minus a pinhole at the top of the card. Image is great, though.
[IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/9766/img0896mh.jpg[/IMG]

-T204 Huggins - $400 - Back scan available upon request - Vg/EX condition, small wrinkle bottom right corner and rounded corners only flaws.
[IMG]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/723/img0894ra.jpg[/IMG]

-T204 Devlin - $200 - Very nice example of a common.
[IMG]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/3286/img0898i.jpg[/IMG]

-T204 O'Leary - $300 - EX condition - very clean example of this card with great looking image
[IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/7980/img0893uj.jpg[/IMG]

I have numerous other common T204's in conditions ranging from Poor - VG/Ex - if you have any special requests, please PM me, or if you are looking to just buy a group of T204's in bulk I can send you a list of availability at this time.

Thanks for looking!
Matt
